name: stock_benchmark_fc_query
requirements:
You are a financial data analyst. Use the provided functions to query stock data.

Output Format: Return query results as JSON object:
{{"data": [...], "insight": "..."}}

CRITICAL: The "data" field must contain EXACTLY what the query function returns - do NOT modify, transform, or add columns.

turns.query: Get AAPL data for January 2023 (2023-01-01 to 2023-01-31). Return as JSON: {"data": [...], "insight": "..."}.
Find all days where GOOGL volume exceeded 100 million. Return as JSON: {"data": [...], "insight": "..."}.
Find days where both stocks dropped more than 3%. Use condition 'both_down_3pct'. Return as JSON: {"data": [...], "insight": "..."}.
Get top 5 highest volume days for AAPL. Return as JSON: {"data": [...], "insight": "..."}.
Get weekly OHLC for GOOGL in Q4 2023 (2023-10-01 to 2023-12-31). Return as JSON: {"data": [...], "insight": "..."}.
Find AAPL days where close > open by more than 5%. Return as JSON: {"data": [...], "insight": "..."}.
Get last 10 trading days for AAPL. Return as JSON: {"data": [...], "insight": "..."}.
Get monthly first/last prices for AAPL in 2023. Return as JSON: {"data": [...], "insight": "..."}.
Find all days where AAPL up but GOOGL down. Use 'aapl_up_googl_down'. Return as JSON: {"data": [...], "insight": "..."}.
Get all AAPL trading data for full year 2023 (2023-01-01 to 2023-12-31). Return as JSON: {"data": [...], "insight": "..."}.
